channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: EPA faces multi-state lawsuit over canceled grants for solar power
item.description: The Trump administration was sued by some two dozen states that are seeking to block the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) from cancelling a $7 bi...

item.title: Donald Trump: America First globalist
item.description: There's a shutdown in D.C., clashes in Chicago , and economic worries bubbling up all over the country — but at the moment, President Trump seems more...

item.title: Exclusive: Trump immigration plan could cut workforce by 15M through 2035, study says
item.description: The Trump administration's immigration crackdown is projected to reduce the U.S. workforce by 6.8 million people by 2028 and by 15.7 million by 2035, ...

item.title: How the Trump-Zelensky relationship evolved after explosive Oval Office meet
item.description: President Trump's relationship with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has taken a U-turn since the leaders' February meeting devolved into a shou...

item.title: Exclusive: MTG slams parts of Trump's second-term agenda as "America Last"
item.description: One of President Trump's most visible MAGA allies in Congress is accusing Republicans of losing their " America First " identity. Why it matters: Rep....

item.title: Government shutdown showcases Mike Johnson’s increasingly bold style
item.description: Johnson, nearly two years into his speakership, is taking a hard line in shutdown negotiations.

item.title: Top military officer central to Trump’s drug war will step down early
item.description: Adm. Alvin Holsey has served as the head of U.S. Southern Command for less than a year. The position typically rotates every three years.

item.title: Trump plans Putin summit on Ukraine, raising stakes for Zelensky meeting
item.description: The call with Putin came right before his meeting with Zelensky where the Ukrainian leader was hoping to obtain new long-range weaponry to use against...

item.title: GOP tries to brand anti-Trump ‘No Kings’ protests as ‘hate America’ rallies
item.description: Ahead of the more than 2,600 rallies planned for Saturday across the country, Republican officials have sought to cast the protests against the presid...

item.title: Trump’s focus on looks — from ‘central casting’ to ‘those lips’
item.description: The president’s longtime interest in physical appearance was frequently in evidence this week, including on his swing through the Middle East.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
